t: Sing*pn to the Lord*s a new song, for*ld he has done marvelous things; his*ln right hand and his holy arm have*ld worked salvation for him.
The*ln Lord*s has made his salvation known and*ld revealed his righteousness to the nations.
He*ln has remembered his love and*ld his faithfulness to Israel; all*ln the ends of the earth have seen the*ld salvation of our God.
Shout*pn for joy to the Lord,*s all the earth, burst*ld into jubilant song with music;
make*ln music to the Lord*s with the harp, with*ld the harp and the sound of singing,
with*ln trumpets and the blast of the ram’s horn— shout*ld for joy before the Lord,*s the King.
Let*pn the sea resound, and everything in it, the*ld world, and all who live in it.
Let*ln the rivers clap their hands, let*ld the mountains sing together for joy;
let*ln them sing before the Lord,*s for*ld he comes to judge the earth. He*ln will judge the world in righteousness and*ld the peoples with equity.
